snippet: Jurors asked a judge in Middlesex County, N.J., to restate the definition of “intimidate.”
abstract: Jurors in the trial of former Rutgers University student Dharun Ravi, accused of invading his roommate Tyler Clementi's privacy by using a webcam to watch him in an intimate encounter with another man, ask Judge Glenn Berman for a clarification on the definition of 'intimidate' and the word 'purpose,' as it relates to the bias intimidation count.
lead_paragraph: Jurors asked a judge in Middlesex County, N.J., to restate the definition of “intimidate.”

headline.seo: In Rutgers Webcam Trial, Jury Asks Judge for Clarification
headline.main: Jury in Rutgers Spying Case Asks Judge for Clarification
headline.print_headline: Jurors in Rutgers Spying Case Ask Judge for Clarification
